meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable jean jacket to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The jean material of his backpack was very sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The jean fabric protected her from the chilly wind.
meanings.sent4: The jean cloth was as tough as a suit of armor.
meanings.sent5: The jean material felt rough but reliable.

meanings.definition: A pair of pants made from denim fabric.
meanings.sent1: He bought a new pair of blue jeans for the party.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite jeans had a small rip near the pocket.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled paint on her best pair of jeans.
meanings.sent4: His jeans were as comfortable as a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The jeans hugged her legs snugly.

meanings.sent1: Jean is a common name in her family.
meanings.sent3: Jean forgot to bring her lunch to school.
meanings.sent4: His jean is easy to remember.
